thread.title: BRIEF-Taubman Centers Inc Urges Shareholders To Vote “For” Taubman Centers’ Director Nominees

title: BRIEF-Taubman Centers Inc Urges Shareholders To Vote “For” Taubman Centers’ Director Nominees

organizations.name: taubman centers’ director nominees reuters staff

text:
May 1, 2018 / 2:21 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Taubman Centers Inc Urges Shareholders To Vote “For” Taubman Centers’ Director Nominees Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - Taubman Centers Inc:
* TAUBMAN CENTERS INC URGES SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE “FOR” TAUBMAN CENTERS’ DIRECTOR NOMINEES AND “AGAINST” L&B CAPITAL’S PROPOSAL - SEC FILING
* TAUBMAN CENTERS INC SAYS L&B CAPITAL’S NON-BINDING PROPOSAL TO ELIMINATE SERIES B PREFERRED STOCK NOT IN BEST INTERESTS OF COMPANY AND SHAREHOLDERS Source text : ( bit.ly/2Fya4Jh ) Further company coverage:
